Kelarm

Back see next project

Previous Next

Building it ....

Kelarm is mobile wireless alarm system, it has a transmitter and a receiver, the transmitter is placed in the items you want to protect and you pocket the receicer, a very small device.The device can provide a range of more than 1km. In case any there is any movements, shock or vibrations where you left the transmitter then immediately in real-time a beep and vibration are triggered on the receiver alerting you on your need for attention.

Technology

Kelarm is built based on several tools, Its PCB is done using the Eagle CadSoft, its mechanical design is developed by SolidWorks 2018, and finally its Software is built using the Arduino language that is based on pure C

Tools I use

SolidWorks 2018
Arduino
Eagle CadSoft
